backend/main.mo: Defines library roles, user profiles, seats, bookings, and access-controlled functions for profile management and admin role assignment.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all frontend files for reference or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the main React bundle with favicon and image preload.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the router, authentication flow, layout, and profile setup modal inside a themed application shell.
frontend/src/components/admin/BookingsTa: Displays all active bookings in a table with user names, seat numbers, dates, and times.
frontend/src/components/admin/LibraryHou: Admin panel for viewing and updating library opening and closing hours.
frontend/src/components/admin/SeatConfig: Shows total, reserved, and general seat counts in a read-only admin view.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserRoleMa: Displays all user profiles in a table and allows admins to change each user's library role.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a sign-in/sign-out button using Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for new users to enter their name and save an initial profile with a default role.
frontend/src/components/booking/ActiveBo: Shows details of the user's active booking and provides a confirmation dialog to cancel it.
frontend/src/components/booking/DateAndS: Lets users select a date and 2‑hour time slot based on schedule constraints.
frontend/src/components/booking/SeatGrid: Renders a grid of seats, highlights availability, and allows users to select and book a seat.
frontend/src/components/booking/SeatLege: Explains seat availability and reserved-seat rules depending on the user's role.
frontend/src/components/common/AccessDen: Full‑screen message indicating insufficient permissions with a button to return to the dashboard.
Provides the main layout with header, navigation, user greeting, login button, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerContext.ts: Provides hooks to fetch caller-related data like profile, admin status, and user role using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook to manage authentication state, login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, roles, schedules, seat availability, and booking operations via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark mode theme variables and base styling utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard with tabs for managing users, bookings, and library settings, gated by admin access.
Displays the public landing page with university info, library features, and a login entry point.
frontend/src/pages/UserDashboardPage.tsx: React dashboard page showing user profile, admin alert, active booking, and tabs for booking flow with date/slot selection and seat grid.
frontend/src/utils/timeSlots.ts: Utility functions for generating time slots, formatting dates/times, and converting between dates and nanoseconds.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from hashes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the system architecture, features, and versions for the ICP-based library seat booking app.
